channel.title: 317 RSPS Class & Objects VS Static & Singletons
channel.description:
Hello.
This question may be extensive or bad, but I am too curious to hold it back.
I have seen some 317 server and client source files before and what I notice every time is that most of the code is running singletons and operates mostly with static variables, instead of making classes with non-static variables of the whole server and just launch an object of the server.
Is there a very logical (and perhaps easy? :| :o) explanation to this?
Thanks.
